title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models via simple API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same CRUD operations as Python lib.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package adding Ollama LLM & embeddings integrations to LangChain.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for chatting with any Ollama model; clone of ChatGPT interface.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenient interactive CLI wrapper around ollama with history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team; use local LLMs as Haystack generators/prompt nodes.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB + LangChain.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, Android compatible.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C# / .NET client for Ollama; supports .NET 6+.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using your local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to generate code & docs using Ollama models inside the editor.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings local LLM power to your workspace channels.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI pipelines; spin up Ollama service and run model-based tests.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing typed async bindings to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Starter template showing how to build a chatbot UI with Streamlit and Ollama.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama; generate, chat, pull models in Go apps.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Community-curated collection of custom Modelfiles for niche/domains (code, medical, roleplay).
